original_text: People like that learned about our Lord Jesus Christ, who saves us. As a result, they had stopped doing the bad things that belong to this world. They had become free from the power of those things. But now they have started to do those bad things again. Those things have power over them and they cannot stop doing them. So now, these false teachers are worse than they were at the beginning, before they believed in the Lord Jesus.
korean_text: 만일 그들이 우리 주 되신 구주 예수 그리스도를 앎으로 세상의 더러움을 피한 후에 다시 그 중에 얽매이고 지면 그 나중 형편이 처음보다 더 심하리니

sentences.original_text: People like that learned about our Lord Jesus Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 사람들은 우리 주 예수 그리스도를 알게 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: As a result, they had stopped doing the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 그들은 나쁜 것들을 멈추었습니다

sentences.original_text: They had become free from the power of those things
But now they have started to do those bad things again
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 지금 그들은 다시 그 나쁜 것들을 시작했습니다

sentences.original_text: Those things have power over them
and they cannot stop doing them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그것들을 멈출 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: So now, these false teachers are worse than they were
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 지금, 이 가짜 교사들은 과거보다 더 나쁩니다

sentences.original_text: at the beginning, before they believed in the Lord Jesus
